rukus.text: Tse — Pysannya, v yakomu nemaye sumnivu, — pryamyy shlyakh dlya bohoboyazlyvykh
yaki viruyutʹ u potayemne, zvershuyutʹ molytvu ta zhertvuyutʹ iz toho, chym nadilyly My yikh
yaki viryatʹ u te, shcho zislano tobi ta v te, shcho zislano pered toboyu, i vpevneni v isnuvanni nastupnoho zhyttya
Vony na shlyakhu Hospoda yikhnʹoho, vony matymutʹ uspikh
Voistynu, tym, yaki ne viruyutʹ, bayduzhe, zasterihatymesh ty yikh chy ni — vony ne uviruyutʹ
Allah zapechatav yikhni sertsya ta slukh, a na ochakh yikhnikh zavisa. Chekaye na nykh kara velyka
